data.message: Looking forward to seeing it again, Yet it's not fair why your not going to more local places like Newport, we  travelled to Birmingham last year and Swansea the year before can you explain why your not more local

replies.message: Hi Linda, each year, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations.
Fair enough but you could get a few more trucks and also why are you in the bull ring Birmingham on 2 dates then
